name: Jellie Splat'em! - Demo
description:
Simple mobile game about splatting green red and blue jellies when they walk over the the splat pad. Don't splat them on the wrong and avoid trying to splat the metal jellies they just cost you points. 

HOW TO PLAY

Tap or click on the coloured pads when the Jellies of the same colour are on it, Avoid clicking when a different colour Jellie is on it and avoid clicking the grey jellie  because you will lose points.

WHY IM BUILDING THIS 

It is my 33rd birthday coming up and I wanted to challenge myself to make a game before my birthday only giving myself 10 or 11 days to do so.

It is still in early demo stage so things will change. But the core game play will stay the same. Share it to friends i only have a one of each device so let me know if you are getting issues with the android device you are using and ill see if i can get some testing done on it.
